text: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya itissā muhuttampi aphāsu bhavissatī ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya itissā muhuttampi aphāsu bhavissatī ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 155. Should any bhikkhunī purposefully provoke anxiety in (another) bhikkhunī, (thinking,) "This way, even for just a moment, she will have no peace" — doing it for just that reason and no other — it is to be confessed.
